h1: How Many Calories Are in a Macaron?
assumptions: Standard French-style macaron, almond meringue shell with buttercream or ganache filling, average size ~15 g, no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand, size, filling type, and recipe; homemade or gourmet versions may differ. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical macaron contains about 50 calories, mostly from sugars and fats in the filling.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a macaron?
faqs.a: Approximately 50 calories for one standard macaron.
Yes, about 6 g of sugars per macaron from the meringue and filling.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in a macaron?
faqs.a: Around 2 g total fat, with 0.5 g saturated, mainly from the filling.
Only about 1 g per macaron, from the almond flour.

faqs.q: How do flavored macarons affect calories?
faqs.a: Flavors like chocolate or fruit add 5-15 calories depending on the filling richness.
